string-array.name: detailed_story
string-array.item:
Arre yaar koyi AC chalao na yaar
Sahi hai!
Baaki saare fake lagein Dekh ke tujhko break lage Door door se theek hai raani Paas aaun to sake lage
Para itna high hua ki Thermometer toot gaya Saiyan ji ka tapak tapak kar Haaye paseena chhoot gaya
Khaali gunda gardi hai Bandi tu bedardi hai Sardi mein bhi kar di hai Kar di hai, kar di hai Kar di, kar di, kar di, kar di
Haaye garmi Haaye garmi Haaye garmi Haaye garmi
December mein kardi summer Tu Lamborghini main hoon Hummer Waise bhi koyi jaldi nai mujhko Main bachpan se hi main latecomer
Million mein tu baby ek Hilti kamar jaise snake Teri sundarta pe likh doon Baby do foot lamba lekh
Kar doon 100 baat ki ek Legi mujhko tu matha tek Garmi kehte hain kisko Tu mujhko gale laga ke dekh
Aise na tu dekh pare Dil kyun mera break kare Laal dress mein raani bilkul Red velvet ka cake lage
Tere jaise jaane kitno ke Dil chaknachoor huye Mere peechhe mar ke aashiq Kitne hi mash-hoor huye
Khaali gunda gardi hai Sardi mein bhi kar di hai Kar di hai, kar di hai
Haaye garmi Haaye garmi Haaye garmi
Garmi garmi garmi garmi Haaye garmi Garmi garmi garmi garmi Haaye garmi
